variables.name: mBreakStrategy
variables.comment: The break strategy for this measured text.

variables.name: mHyphenationFrequency
variables.comment: The hyphenation frequency for this measured text.

variables.name: mLineBreakConfig
variables.comment: The line break configuration for calculating text wrapping.

methods.name: public Builder setBreakStrategy(@Layout.BreakStrategy int strategy)
methods.comment:
* Set the line break strategy.
             *
             * The default value is {@link Layout#BREAK_STRATEGY_HIGH_QUALITY}.
             *
             * @param strategy the break strategy
             * @return this builder, useful for chaining
             * @see StaticLayout.Builder#setBreakStrategy
             * @see android.widget.TextView#setBreakStrategy

methods.name: public Builder setHyphenationFrequency(@Layout.HyphenationFrequency int frequency)
methods.comment:
* Set the hyphenation frequency.
             *
             * The default value is {@link Layout#HYPHENATION_FREQUENCY_NORMAL}.
             *
             * @param frequency the hyphenation frequency
             * @return this builder, useful for chaining
             * @see StaticLayout.Builder#setHyphenationFrequency
             * @see android.widget.TextView#setHyphenationFrequency

methods.name: public Builder setTextDirection(@NonNull TextDirectionHeuristic textDir)
methods.comment:
* Set the text direction heuristic.
             *
             * The default value is {@link TextDirectionHeuristics#FIRSTSTRONG_LTR}.
             *
             * @param textDir the text direction heuristic for resolving bidi behavior
             * @return this builder, useful for chaining
             * @see StaticLayout.Builder#setTextDirection

methods.name: public Builder setLineBreakConfig(@NonNull LineBreakConfig lineBreakConfig)
methods.comment:
* Set the line break config for the text wrapping.
             *
             * @param lineBreakConfig the newly line break configuration.
             * @return this builder, useful for chaining.
             * @see StaticLayout.Builder#setLineBreakConfig

methods.name: public Params build()
methods.comment:
* Build the {@link Params}.
             *
             * @return the layout parameter
